p: Multi-antibiotic resistance is becoming one of the major global concerns. Pseudomonas aeruginosa, Klebsiella pneumonia, Escherichia coli and many other ß-lactamase inhibitors have become a major clinical problem. Increased attention has been focused on the usage of natural antimicrobial agents, especially from plant origins, due to their safety and efficacy as well as the fact that the majority of essential oils are classified as Generally Recognized As Safe (GRAS) [17].
